quotes.quote: People always call it luck when you've acted more sensibly than they have.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
quotes.author: Harry Golden

quotes.quote: A pound of pluck is worth a ton of luck.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: We must believe in luck. For how else can we explain the success of those we don't like?
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: True luck consists not in holding the best of the cards at the table; luckiest is he who knows just when to rise and go home.
quotes.author: John Hay

quotes.quote: Luck is what you have left over after you give 100 percent.
quotes.author: Langston Coleman

quotes.quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
